1: -module(mylib_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("proper/include/proper.hrl").
    7: 
    8: all() ->
    9:     [test_manually_crafted_property,
   10:      prop_same_but_autogenerated].
   11: 
   12: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   13:     [{'start', 5}, {'end', 10}, {expected, ok} | Config].
   14: 
   15: test_mylib() ->
   16:     [{userdata,[{doc,"Testing the mylib module"}]}].
   17: 
   18: test_mylib(_Config) ->
   19:     {skip,"Not implemented."}.
   20: 
   21: manually_crafted_property(C) ->
   22:     ?FORALL(X, integer(?config('start', C), ?config('end', C)),
   23:             mylib:my_func(X) =:= ?config(expected, C)).
   24: 
   25: prop_same_but_autogenerated(C) ->
   26:     ?FORALL(X, integer(?config('start', C), ?config('end', C)),
   27:             mylib:my_func(X) =:= ?config(expected, C)).
   28: 
   29: test_manually_crafted_property(Config) ->
   30:     true = proper:quickcheck(manually_crafted_property(Config), []).
